name: Mystery Case Files®: Escape from Ravenhearst™
description: Return once more to the haunted grounds of Ravenhearst Manor to uncover new details about this poignant saga. What you find could very well be the final chapter of this riveting story—if you escape.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Win7/8 Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1245 MB available space
